import { createPortal } from "react-dom"; import "./Rules.css"; const Rules = ({ closeRulesModal }: any) => { return createPortal(

Rules and How to Play

The purpose of the Game is to identify SETs of 3 cards from the 12 unique cards shown on the board.

What is a Set?

A set consists of three cards in which each feature (shape, color, number and fill) are all the same, or all different.

Examples of Sets:

How to Play:

Once you think youâ€™ve found a set, click on the cards. If it is a set, the selected cards will turn green, a +1 will be added to your score, and the three cards will be replaced by new cards. If it is not a set, the cards will turn red and your score will decrease be 1.

, document.body ); }; export default Rules;
